channel.title: Stratoshark on Josh Clark
channel.description: Recent content in Stratoshark on Josh Clark

item.title: Getting Started With Stratoshark
item.description: Introduction Stratoshark is the newest piece of software coming from the Wireshark Foundation. For experienced network analysts like me, it promises to be a familiar interface and filtering engine for unfamiliar domains like cloud and system call internals. In particular, I’m really excited to be able to analyze system calls on Linux systems. This post summarizes what I’ve learned about how to set up a lab environment, install Stratoshark, and begin some analysis.
